description:
Very spacious apartment, in a really nice, very safe area in Astoria, Queens (ranked as the 3rd safest area in the entire NYC), Less than 3 min walk to the train station, 7 min to Manhattan, 10 min to times square. Pharmacy, 24 hours grocery store and a dollar tree store within 3 min walk. Lots of great stores around the corner. VERY warm - central heat, Jacuzzi , brand new furniture just for your perfect stay.

Free parking is available on the street.
name: The best place to spend Christmas in NYC
review: Zeina is an amazing host! The place is as advertised, clean/confortable and very accesible. I will stay again for my upcoming business trips. Highly recommended!
